description:
In a realm which exists right next to reality but no ordinary people can see, there is the "Magician’s Academy" – the school for today`s wizards and witches who live between the realms, hiding their true identities while they are among us. Takuto Hasegawa looks like a high school boy who embodies the word "ordinary" in every sense, but he is actually a wizard in the making who secretly attends the Academy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: なんか女の子出てきちゃったんですけど.
